DOC.brief_title: Sleep Pain Intervention Chronic Widespread Pain Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled clinical trial examine effect CBT patient chronic widespread pain insomnia . Sample include 20 patient ( [ 18 ] -65 year ) satisfy criterion chronic widespread pain insomnia . Participants randomly assign CBT waitlist control . All participant randomize cognitive-behavioral intervention receive 4 treatment session ( ~50 minute ) . Baseline , posttreatment , [ & 3-mo . ] follow-up assessment include measure sleep , pain , thermal pain response , heart rate variability , brain structure function , affect , cognitive functioning , cardiovascular health , substance use .
